申.definition: to extend; to state; to explain; 9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey; ancient Chinese compass point: 240°

申不害.definition: Shen Buhai (385-337 BC), legalist political thinker

申冤.definition: to appeal for justice; to demand redress for a grievance

申命記.definition: Book of Deuteronomy; Fifth Book of Moses

申城.definition: alternative name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]; alternative name for Xinyang City, Henan 信陽市|信阳市[Xin4 yang2 Shi4]

申報.definition: to report (to the authorities); to declare (to customs)

申奏.definition: to present (a document); to submit (a petition)

申斥.definition: to rebuke; to blame; to denounce

申明.definition: to declare; to aver; to state formally

申時.definition: 3-5 pm (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)

申曲.definition: Shanghai opera; same as 滬劇|沪剧

申根.definition: Schengen, village in Luxemburg, location of the 1985 signing of the agreement to create the Schengen area 申根區|申根区[Shen1 gen1 qu1]

申根區.definition: the Schengen area, a passport-free zone in Europe

申狀.definition: to present (a document); to submit (a petition)

申理.definition: to right a wrong; to seek justice

申申.definition: cozy and comfortable; to repeat endlessly

申訴.definition: to file a complaint; to appeal (to an authority, a higher court of justice etc); complaint; appeal

申請.definition: to apply for sth; application form (CL:份[fen4])

申請書.definition: application; application form; petition (to higher authorities)

申論.definition: to give a detailed exposition; to state in detail

申購.definition: to ask to buy; to bid for purchase

申辦.definition: to apply for; to bid for

申辯.definition: to defend oneself; to rebut a charge

申述.definition: to state; to assert; to allege; to specify

申通.definition: STO Express, courier service headquartered in Shanghai, founded in 1993

申遺.definition: to apply for UNESCO World Heritage status

申雪.definition: to right a wrong; to redress an injustice

申飭.definition: to warn; to blame; to rebuke; also written 申斥
